dataSource.label: Data source:
dataSource.tooltip: Select the data source for the chart
dataSource.selectTooltip: Choose the data source (API, file, etc.)
dataSource.selectTitle: Select a field for this group

table.label: Table:
table.tooltip: The data table currently used for the chart
table.selectTooltip: The data table corresponding to the selected chart type
table.selectTitle: Select an action for the field in the group

disableAction: Action not available for this field

hints.xAxis: Choose a field for the X axis
hints.yAxis: Choose a field for the Y axis

disabled.xField: Action not available for X field in this chart type
disabled.yField: Action not available for Y fields in bar charts
disabled.columnLegend: Action not available for column legend in Line & Column chart
